kpi.name: LTE_1073a

( - 22*lpqul.ue_pwr_headroom_pusch_level1 - 20*lpqul.ue_pwr_headroom_pusch_level2 - 18*lpqul.ue_pwr_headroom_pusch_level3 - 16*lpqul.ue_pwr_headroom_pusch_level4 - kpi_info.title: Avg UE power headroom for PUSCH, from histogram PIs
kpi_info.use: Average UE power headroom for PUSCH calculated from histogram counters
kpi_info.formula:
SUM(-22*UE_PWR_HEADROOM_PUSCH_LEVEL1
- 20*UE_PWR_HEADROOM_PUSCH_LEVEL2
- 18*UE_PWR_HEADROOM_PUSCH_LEVEL3
- 16*UE_PWR_HEADROOM_PUSCH_LEVEL4
- 14*UE_PWR_HEADROOM_PUSCH_LEVEL5

+ 0*UE_PWR_HEADROOM_PUSCH_LEVEL12
